description: Complete your next alfresco spread with this smoky eggplant dip. Try your hand at this healthier dip, you'll love the rich flavour and creamy texture.
name: Smoky Eggplant Dip Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 bunch bunch mint, leaves picked, finely chopped
2 tsp Woolworths extra virgin olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Cook eggplant in a chargrill pan over medium-high heat, turning often, for 25 minutes or until charred and very soft. Transfer to a heatproof bowl and set aside for 1 hour to cool. Remove and discard skin. Place eggplant flesh in a colander set over a bowl for 20 minutes to drain excess liquid.

Place half of the eggplant in a food processor and process until smooth. Add remaining eggplant and process to combine. Transfer to a small bowl. Stir in yoghurt, tahini, lemon juice, garlic and mint. Season with pepper. Sprinkle with smoked paprika and drizzle with oil to serve.
